This game is amazing. I started four years ago, and I quit for 3 years because it pissed me off, but I missed it. So I decided to re download it a couple months ago. Makes me rage from time to time, but I do recommend. This game is fun with friends and also fun yourself. Downside is, there are a LOT of toxic people in this game, but don't let that stop you from playing.
